name: GetAppUsageMetrics
description:
Fetch usage metrics for a specific app over a time range.

Call this tool to obtain usage metrics for a specific app within a given time period. It's useful for tracking app performance and usage patterns. An app management API token is required to access this information.

parameters.name: start_date_utc
parameters.description: Start date of the period in UTC format (e.g., 2024-12-31).

value_schema.description: Start date of the period in UTC format. For example, 2024-12-31.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date of the period in UTC format (e.g., 2024-12-31).

value_schema.description: End date of the period in UTC format. For example, 2024-12-31.

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the app to retrieve usage metrics for. This ID specifies which app's data to fetch.

value_schema.description: ID of the app to get metrics for.

parameters.name: group_metrics_by_period
parameters.description: The time period to group the data by. Accepted values: 'DAY', 'WEEK', or 'MONTH'.

value_schema.description: Group data by this time period.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date of the period in UTC format. For example, 2024-12-31.

value_schema.description: Start date of the period in UTC format. For example, 2024-12-31.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date of the period in UTC format. For example, 2024-12-31.

value_schema.description: End date of the period in UTC format. For example, 2024-12-31.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Group data by this time period.

value_schema.description: Group data by this time period.

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: ID of the app to get metrics for.

value_schema.description: ID of the app to get metrics for.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
